resources.string: This is a really long chunk of text that will be replaced, never to be seen again, whenever a JokeView is added to the list.

string-array.name: joke_list
string-array.item: A small boy swallowed some coins and was taken to the hospital. When his grandmother called to ask how he was a nurse said, \'No change yet\'.
Cartoonist found dead in home. Details are sketchy.
I wondered why the baseball was getting bigger. Then it hit me.
What kind of teeth can you buy for a dollar? Buck-teeth.
Two fish were in a tank. One turns to the other, \'How do you drive this thing?\'
